channel.title: RNG on Pencroff
channel.description: Recent content in RNG on Pencroff

item.title: Fluky - random number generator library
item.description: I was always curious about Random Number Generator (RNG) implementation. The magic how from few numbers inside it generates long sequence “randomly” distributed numbers. I did few experiments on my ZX Spectrum with it limited performance. And this article I would like to share the fluky library.
